How To Organize Your Legal Team’s Work In YouTrack

It’s no secret that YouTrack is used by various sorts of teams, including legal ones. In conversations with our customers, legal technologies and legal operations are emerging as hot topics. YouTrack can help legal firms whose main areas of business are jurisprudence and providing legal services, as well as in-house legal departments at companies in a variety of industries.

We’ve put together this post as a useful primer for legal teams who want to learn more about how they could use technology to make their work easier or more efficient. YouTrack is highly customizable, and this helps legal teams adopt it more easily. Here’s what you’ll find.

  • Real examples of how legal teams manage their operations in YouTrack – from both a boutique Czech law firm and JetBrains’ in-house legal department.
  • Special offer from AgiLawyer – a YouTrack-certified partner specializing in working with legal teams. You can get in touch with them for a free dedicated demo or a proof-of-concept project for your team.
  • An overview of YouTrack’s features for legal operations.

Case studies from legal teams using YouTrack

Here’s a detailed look at how YouTrack helps teams manage legal operations in real business scenarios.

Holubová advokáti

In this case study, the Managing Partners of Holubová advokáti share how their law firm’s processes are fully managed with YouTrack. The team began using the solution with the help of YouTrack’s consulting partner AgiLawyer four years ago. They have since cut their time spent on task coordination by 30%.

Read the case study

The corporate legal team at JetBrains

The JetBrains legal team provides support for 18 types of requests to over 2,000 employees and closely collaborates in YouTrack with all other departments in the company. Get an inside look at how a corporation’s legal workflow can be organized.

Read the case study

Getting started: Free consulting from a YouTrack partner

A JetBrains-certified consulting partner is available to help you better understand how your legal team’s work can be set up in YouTrack. As a full-service advisory agency, AgiLawyer has experience revolutionizing legal services for the digital age. They are passionate about bringing the best legaltech practices into action. As you can see from the Holubová advokáti case study, the AgiLawyer team is ready to help YouTrack customers set up their legal projects for success.

We recommend contacting us to get a free consultation and demo from the AgiLawyer team. After that, if you’d like to take the next step, you can make arrangements with them for a free proof-of-concept project. This will give you a glimpse of how YouTrack can help you organize your team’s processes. You can specify your requirements and get a customized YouTrack setup to see if it’s a good fit for your team in practice. The demo and proof-of-concept projects can be presented in English or Czech and are offered free of charge to any prospective YouTrack customer.

Request a free demo

Learn more about how YouTrack fits into legal workflows

To see what you can expect from YouTrack for your legal workflows, check out an overview of the YouTrack features that are relevant for legal teams. YouTrack can be used for a whole host of legal processes, including those related to compliance, data privacy, payroll, procurement, taxes, and other things.

See the YouTrack feature overview

Curious about how other teams in your company can use YouTrack? Visit our Teams page to explore more scenarios.

We always appreciate your feedback. Please share it in the comments below, and don’t hesitate to contact our Support team if you have any questions. We’re always here to help!
